definition: to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
variant of 記錄|记录[ji4 lu4] (but in Taiwan, not for the verb sense "to record")
catalog/table of contents/directory (on computer hard drive)/list/contents
to hire (an employee)/to accept (a manuscript) for publication
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit

sentences.english: Finally, for his collection of short stories of "Works Strange Record" study.
sentences.chinese: 最后是对牛峤所编的小说集《灵怪录》的研究。

sentences.english: For the first album, it was mostly my tracks.
sentences.chinese: 但是第一张专辑里大部分录的是我的音。

sentences.english: My favorites are video clips of people doing insanely un-human things.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的就是看人做一些不像人能做得到的录影片。

sentences.english: I do certainly and I just want to go on the record here.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定会祈祷的，我只是想继续录今天的节目。

sentences.english: The Group recorded two albums since Sanchez's addition.
sentences.chinese: 派特马斯尼的乐队在桑切斯加入以后录了两盘专辑。

sentences.english: Recorded for a friend on fanfiction. net.
Charlie smiled rather sheepishly and said, "I still have my list."
sentences.chinese: 查理羞怯地微笑着说，“我仍然保存着我的赞赏录。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the different formations of the disyllabic words in You Ming Lu, an anthology in Nan dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 南朝小说《幽明录》的复音词有多种构词方式。

sentences.english: UberProAudio: Did the band use any different guitar gear in the studio during the recording of the new album?
sentences.chinese: 录这张新专辑的时候你们用了什么不同的器材吗？

sentences.english: I think Dana recorded this in Lawson's office, listen.
sentences.chinese: 我猜是戴娜是在劳森的办公室录的，你听。
她意外地抹去了录了音的磁带。

sentences.english: Tim and Tom taped two tom- toms together.
sentences.chinese: 提姆和汤姆一起录了两支印第安手鼓歌。

sentences.english: My new VCR is not functioning right.
sentences.chinese: 我新买的录放影机功能不太正常。

sentences.english: He was caught with his pants down, on video tape showing him accepting the money.
sentences.chinese: 他在接受钱的时候被人录像录了下来，当场抓住。

sentences.english: Let us take the broadcast on tape .
sentences.chinese: 咱们把这个广播节目录到磁带上。

sentences.english: Of all the books I have read, Meditation is the book I like best.
sentences.chinese: 在我读过的书里，《沉思录》是我最喜欢的。

definition: to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
fragment (of speech etc)/extract (from book etc)/episode (of story etc)
voicing (adjustment of timbre, loudness etc of organ or other musical instrument)
to sing opera music (without staging or make up)
